Click on the gradient editor to add new color slider, then the colored box below the slider to change its color. 
      Click the red box below indicator (and confirm) to delete. 
      Once finished, click the arrow icon to upload into the desired slot. 
      To edit existing palette, click the pencil icon.

83395ec989f2344bc79065db7dbb8bb66fe27141.content: ⚠ Unencrypted transmission. Be prudent when selecting PIN, do NOT use your banking, door, SIM, etc. pin!

d7391ff8158a7b7912f8c5dee29ba71eda92c7b5.content: To enable OTA, for security reasons you need to also enter the correct password!

9e230c72658d448523c0dc7fecba9881c16d6cc0.content: The password should be changed when OTA is enabled.

64384d82fc61a422d7cc7a50e48335b7ac2f5d77.content: Disable OTA when not in use, otherwise an attacker can reflash device software!

2e128451fec65e9cf2c2347b551ddb141908cd76.content: Settings on this page are only changable if OTA lock is disabled!

4ea88824be45e76e1fc027a08439495a7bfde728.content: Deny access to WiFi settings if locked:

1d59c3316340522604d21085f1a9bab79bd48397.content: All settings and presets will be erased.

c83797ac186073f9801e6925d56e6a86d25b09ed.content: ⚠ Unencrypted transmission. An attacker on the same network can intercept form data!

97b188b30243ab03a715b883478ee8218de11199.content: ⚠ Restoring presets/configuration will OVERWRITE your current presets/configuration.

1e2566328c1fb964cfbd460fb12bc461f2b393b1.content: Incorrect upload or configuration may require a factory reset or re-flashing of your ESP.

52064ea54e3b2415f237e9053791f5e883711412.content: Pressing Populate will create LED panel layout with pre-arranged matrix.

16ed55b1d5fb8dbe0a6d990b4dc748d3c760a176.content: WARNING: You may need to update each panel parameters after they are generated.

556aa8da89f318581d6f2e6526d3975dd337dd43.content: A matrix is made of 1 or more physical LED panels.

f4777b588dd8a2b3f2f1a756be2080c3d1f90bf3.content: Each panel can be of different size and/or have different LED orientation and/or starting point and/or layout.

a19e5079fda45cb7475f268036f1a44d4f1075b4.content: file containing an array with number of elements equal to the matrix size.

d50c89509268f09e716705d6ebb4d069e354f75c.content: A value of -1 means that pixel at that position is missing, a value of 0 means never paint that pixel, and 1 means regular pixel.
